The Fondazione Paolo Cannavaro in Rome has received the approval of Italian Prime Minister Enrico Letta in a cabinet reshuffle. Cannavaro, who is currently the minister of the Arts, Culture, and Sport, was announced in a cabinet meeting on Thursday, January 8, as minister of culture, arts, and education. He will be given two years to implement a comprehensive strategy in the area of contemporary art, culture, and education, and will assume his responsibilities on January 27, 2021
